Storage Made Simple.

Your valuable documents deserve more than a deposit box. Benefit from the ultimate storage powerhouse, with Safely Deposit’s simple and efficient solutions.

GET STARTED

One in four Americans have lost or forgotten a financial document.  

Only 40 percent can locate important documents when needed.*

Store, access, and control the documents that matter most.

Upload a range physical and digital files for your family or business.

  • Birth Certificates

  • Passports

  • Tax Returns

  • Financial Records

  • Business Documents

  • And More
SIGN UP

*From a Consumer Reports National Research Center survey.

Easily manage and share your documents with trusted contacts and loved ones.

Convenience

Storage is easy to setup and use. Skip the hassle of a bank deposit box and enjoy exceptional, on-demand customer service.

Beneficiary Management

Share documents with beneficiaries, track life events, record data, and make beneficiary designations.

Chain of Custody

Keep track of all changes in the custody, control, transfer, and disposition of valuable documents.

How it works

1

Sign up

Create an account and subscribe to the plan that fits your needs.

2

Checklist

Receive a checklist of recommended documents, tailored to your priorities.

3

Upload

Upload all selected and relevant documents to your account.

4

Access & Manage

Control and share access to documents, with bank vault storage options for original paper copies.
